skills.title: Stoneskin
skills.description: Give an ally Earth zombie +1 Def

skills.title: Rabies
skills.description: Give an ally Fire zombie Feral

skills.title: Ice Bolt
skills.description: Deal 2 damage to a target zombie. If it survives, Freeze it

skills.title: Push
skills.description: Return an ally Air zombie to your hand

skills.title: Toxic Power
skills.description: Deal 1 damage to an ally Toxic zombie and give it +1 Atk

skills.title: Healing Touch
skills.description: Restore 2 Def to an ally zombie

cards.name: Whizpar
cards.flavor_text: The unfriendly ghost...

cards.name: Pushhh
cards.description: Entry: Return a zombie to its owner's Hand
cards.flavor_text: Like any adolescent child that wishes you to leave him be... so GO AWAY!!

cards.name: Ztormcaller
cards.flavor_text: Thor's best student just got a little angrier...

cards.name: ZeuZ
cards.flavor_text: From mount Zolympus in the sky - fear Ze-might of ZeuZ!

cards.name: Rockky
cards.flavor_text: Addriaaannn!!! Addriaaaaaannnnn!!!

cards.name: Golem
cards.flavor_text: mmMMWhaaaaat?

cards.name: Mountain
cards.flavor_text: When the mountain comes to you... you'll run!

cards.name: Walley
cards.flavor_text: "Eeeeeeva"

cards.name: Pyromaz
cards.flavor_text: He's really into that old Prodigy song... Firestarter...

cards.name: Burrrnn
cards.flavor_text: So he likes all the pretty bright colors, can you blame him?

cards.name: Cynderman
cards.flavor_text: Hot, so very hot - all the time!

cards.name: Gargantua
cards.flavor_text: (sing) Under pressure... coming down on you...

cards.name: Fire-Maw
cards.flavor_text: There's always an aftershock, duck twice

cards.name: Stapler
cards.flavor_text: No pain, no gain.

cards.name: Nail Bomb
cards.flavor_text: When you really want to nail it!

cards.name: Goo Bottles
cards.flavor_text: Adding more goo to an already overly-goo-ed party is just too goo-d!

cards.name: Chainsaw
cards.description: +4 Atk to a zombie; End: 4 damage to this zombie
cards.flavor_text: Cutting through flesh, bone and even steel, it's easy to see why this is a fan-favorite!

cards.name: Azuraz
cards.flavor_text: Beeee yourself!

cards.name: Shroom
cards.flavor_text: Some like to grow flowers, others grow hallucinogenic poison mushrooms...

cards.name: Vindrom
cards.flavor_text: BDSM much?!

cards.name: Shammann
cards.flavor_text: Dancing around a fire alone is a hoot, but bringing all your dead friends to join is a party!

cards.name: Puffer
cards.description: Entry: +1 Atk to all Life zombies in play
cards.flavor_text: All the pretty pretty flowers

cards.name: Poizom
cards.flavor_text: Just like any frat boy, after the Friday night bash - bloated, gassy, puking and generally unpleasant to be around...

cards.name: Ghoul
cards.flavor_text: Being dead has its perks, but in this case time and humidity has not been kind - the rotting flesh is literally sapping off the bone on this one.

cards.name: Hazmaz
cards.flavor_text: Being cooped up inside a plastic suit is no fun - now multiple this by 1,000 with all the extra gases, something's gotta give...

cards.name: Cherno-bill
cards.flavor_text: Lumbering around in a world made of butter gets old real fast, maybe that's why he's sooo angry!

cards.name: Izze
cards.flavor_text: It would be a-lot Izzier if you just stay put!

cards.name: Jetter
cards.flavor_text: Most welcomed during hot summer days on the busy city streets.

cards.name: Freezzee
cards.description: Entry: Freeze zombie and adjacent zombies, 2 damage if Frozen
cards.flavor_text: How he loves decorating with ice sculptures... Everywhere!

cards.name: Tzunamy
cards.description: Entry: 2 damage to all enemies, then Freeze them
cards.flavor_text: Bringing a nice, big shower, cleaning an entire city at a time.

cards.name: Bouncer
cards.flavor_text: From a young age he just loves to bounce things - especially rocks... on other rocks...

cards.name: Wheezy
cards.description: Entry: A random card in your Hand gets -1 cost
cards.flavor_text: Ommmmmmmmmmm

cards.name: Tiny
cards.flavor_text: Cooookie... just one more cooookie...

cards.name: Earthshaker
cards.flavor_text: Will break ALL your WALLS!!

cards.name: Cerberus
cards.flavor_text: It's ALWAYS a party of three.

cards.name: Werezomb
cards.flavor_text: Stop, stop, stop, shh-shh, you'll cause a howl

cards.name: Z-Virus
cards.flavor_text: There ain't no party like a Z-Virus party!

cards.name: Yggdrazil
cards.description: Entry: Entry: Reanimate all Life zombies that died this match
cards.flavor_text: In this case, lots of strings attached!!

cards.name: Sapper
cards.description: Attack: Restore 1 Def for each damage this deals
cards.flavor_text: Hungry, always so very hungry

cards.name: Keeper
cards.flavor_text: They are usually such lovely beasts...

cards.name: Zpitter
cards.flavor_text: Llama in my living room... bam ba balalam babam ba ba...

cards.name: Zeeter
cards.description: Entry: Devour an ally zombie, get its Atk and Def
cards.flavor_text: Nam, naam nam nam namm nam...

cards.name: Zhatterer
cards.flavor_text: So the other day Gargantua asked for a toothpick.. and it needs to be really cold to actually work...

cards.name: Znowman
cards.flavor_text: Maybe the snow does have some magical power?! But not yellow snow...

cards.name: Soothsayer
cards.flavor_text: Almost as good as a fortune cookie... minus the cookie

cards.name: Spiker
cards.flavor_text: Standing really still... maybe they won't notice

cards.name: IgneouZ
cards.description: Entry: +2 Def if your Overlord has 10 def or less
cards.flavor_text: Mmmm, nothing like the smell of fresh cinder and ash in the morning

cards.name: Zhampion
cards.description: Feral, Entry: Summon two enemy Pyromaz zombies
cards.flavor_text: I AM THE CHAMPION - my friend!! ME - ONLY ME!!!

cards.name: Goo Beaker
cards.flavor_text: So much goo, so little space

cards.name: Bloomer
cards.description: Entry: Draw a card if you have a Life zombie in play
cards.flavor_text: Fertilizing the flowers on an hourly basis

cards.name: Zludge
cards.flavor_text: Bring it, bring It, BRING IT ON!!!

cards.name: Blizzard
cards.flavor_text: If you can't join them, FREEZE them!

cards.name: Ztormonk
cards.flavor_text: Just be a good sentinel and -

cards.name: Draft
cards.description: Entry: Draw a card from the enemy Deck
cards.flavor_text: Not your father... hopefully

cards.name: MonZoon
cards.description: Costs 1 less for each Air zombie in your Hand
cards.flavor_text: Shock therapy does work wonders

cards.name: Blocker
cards.flavor_text: Just a few more moments...

cards.name: Slab
cards.flavor_text: Supressing all those emotions does have its price...

cards.name: Pyrite
cards.description: Heavy, Delayed 2: This loses Heavy but gets +4 Atk
cards.flavor_text: Angry enough to go though a WALL!

cards.name: Gaea
cards.description: Entry: All ally Earth zombies in play get +2 Atk
cards.flavor_text: Either super charismatic, or super scary... or both.

cards.name: Fresh Meat
cards.description: Entry: All enemy zombies get -3 Atk until the end of turn
cards.flavor_text: As if they died again and went to zombie heaven

cards.name: Ectoplasm
cards.flavor_text: Wha'ch yu lookin at' ?!

cards.name: GooZilla
cards.description: Entry: Use all your goo for 2x Atk / Def
cards.flavor_text: More, more, MORE GOO! Bring me ALL the GOO

cards.name: Maelstrom
cards.description: Entry: Return all other zombies to their owners' Hands
cards.flavor_text: Sometimes pukes a little in his mouth from all the spinning, but keeps a scary face!

cards.name: Fumez
cards.description: Entry: Add a Tainted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavor_text: RAZENGAAAAAAAA!!!

cards.name: Gaz
cards.description: Guard, Entry: Add a Corrupted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavor_text: No, no, no no, not a hamster, not a hamster ball....

cards.name: Pit
cards.description: Heavy, Entry: Add a Tainted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavor_text: Hard to save every drop with all the spillage

cards.name: Crater
cards.description: Heavy, Entry: Add a Corrupted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavor_text: Try to veer from his major crater issues... it may goo deeeeep

cards.name: Quazi
cards.description: Feral, Overflow 2, End: 2 damage to this and adjacent zombies
cards.flavor_text: Has a great fascination with church bells...

cards.name: Modo
cards.description: Feral, Overflow 5, End: 4 damage to this and adjacent zombies
cards.flavor_text: JuuuZZZt WaNt a LiTtlE hUgGG...

cards.name: Zap
cards.description: Overflow 3, Entry: Summon a 1/1 enemy zombie minion
cards.flavor_text: Can't get enough of that goo, ever

cards.name: Cactuz
cards.description: Overflow 6, Entry: Summon two 1/1 enemy zombie minions
cards.flavor_text: And so he walked the desert for 40 years, only to find he's been walking in circles....

cards.name: Zeptic
cards.flavor_text: After four steps he gave up on the straight line and started puking

cards.name: Hazzard
cards.flavor_text: Almost reached the Goo-Anonymous meeting - almost...

cards.name: Ozmoziz
cards.description: Entry: Freeze a random ally, add Tainted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavor_text: He always loved to tell a goo story

cards.name: Geyzer
cards.description: Entry: Freeze 2 random allies, add Corrupted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavor_text: Not in the mood for dancing...

cards.name: Tainted Goo
cards.description: Overflow 3, Disables 1 goo vial for next turn
cards.flavor_text: Smells kinda funny, but what a rush!

cards.name: Corrupted Goo
cards.description: Overflow 6, Disables 2 goo vials for next turn
cards.flavor_text: Hooooweeee, better than all the moonshine!

cards.name: Whistle
cards.flavor_text: Get over here, STAT!

cards.name: Znowy
cards.flavor_text: eeeehhehehehe

cards.name: Wazte
cards.flavor_text: Smells like goo spirit

cards.name: Ztalagmite
cards.flavor_text: He remembers the north

cards.name: Igloo
cards.flavor_text: The cold never bothered him anyway

cards.name: Froztbite
cards.flavor_text: He's been trying to get out for a millennia - thank you global warming!!

cards.name: Amber
cards.flavor_text: Literally a walking museum

cards.name: Bark
cards.flavor_text: Worse than its bite!

cards.name: Germ
cards.flavor_text: Ploop... oh.. there goes another arm...

cards.name: Ember
cards.flavor_text: Makes every BBQ a hoot!

cards.name: Firewall
cards.flavor_text: Having a pyromaniac on the battlefield does come in handy

cards.name: BurZt
cards.flavor_text: Some just like it hot!

cards.name: Extinguisher
cards.flavor_text: Psssshhhhhhhhhhh

cards.name: Lawnmower
cards.flavor_text: It can handle both plants and zombies... wait what?

cards.name: Shale
cards.flavor_text: Thatta boy!

cards.name: Hardy
cards.flavor_text: This will BE, the preetiest castle in all the land!

cards.name: Breezee
cards.flavor_text: Levitating - not as easy as you'd think...

cards.name: Banshee
cards.flavor_text: Booked until next year in haunted houses everywhere

cards.name: Zhocker
cards.flavor_text: Getting jiggy with it

cards.name: Bolderr
cards.flavor_text: One more step, just one more step!

cards.name: Zlimey
cards.flavor_text: Likes to sprinkle toxic goo on EVERYTHING

cards.name: Azzazzin
cards.flavor_text: From the Shadowzzzz

cards.name: PreZerver
cards.flavor_text: Need a hand?

cards.name: Zephyr
cards.description: Costs 1 less for each Air zombie you have in play
cards.flavor_text: Do you want to buy AIR for a penny??

cards.name: BlaZter
cards.flavor_text: Dodgeball anyone?

cards.name: Zlinger
cards.flavor_text: Ohhh snap!! He got'cha good

cards.name: Mind Flayer
cards.description: Entry: Take control of an enemy zombie
cards.flavor_text: Resistance is futile --- and we have Zushi

cards.name: Molotov
cards.flavor_text: Not suitable for n00bs and lightweights

cards.name: Bat
cards.description: 2 damage to a zombie and Distract it
cards.flavor_text: Simple but soooo effective

cards.name: Super Serum
cards.flavor_text: Captain Zamberica - here we goo!!

cards.name: Buffer
cards.flavor_text: Be like the water - only with air

cards.name: Whiffer
cards.description: Entry: Return an ally zombie to your Hand
cards.flavor_text: Get back here

cards.name: Dragger
cards.description: Entry: Summon a zombie from your Hand that costs 2 or less
cards.flavor_text: There's more where this came from!

cards.name: Zyclone
cards.description: Entry: Return all zombies that cost 3 or less to their owners' Hands
cards.flavor_text: A little anti-social... with a dash of anger issues

cards.name: Pebble
cards.description: Entry: 1 damage to a random enemy zombie
cards.flavor_text: Always forgets his head... everywhere...

cards.name: Crumbz
cards.flavor_text: Time is our greatest adversary

cards.name: Protector
cards.description: Heavy, Death: Give a random ally zombie Heavy
cards.flavor_text: Always use protection

cards.name: Defender
cards.description: Entry: Give ally Earth zombies that cost 2 or less Heavy
cards.flavor_text: Forecast was clear skies... no one said fireball shower

cards.name: Firecaller
cards.description: Entry: Draw a card if there is a damaged zombie in play
cards.flavor_text: Is it a vision of the future or another dimension? Who knows?!

cards.name: RabieZ
cards.description: Feral, Death: Give a random ally zombie Feral
cards.flavor_text: Red eyes - check! Foam in mouth - check! Shaking - check! Here, take an advil.

cards.name: Enrager
cards.description: Feral, Entry: If your Overlord has 10 Def or less this gets +2 Atk
cards.flavor_text: Don't get him angry, you won't like him when he's angry.

cards.name: Supply Drop
cards.description: Each player puts a random zombie from their deck into play
cards.flavor_text: "Geronimo!"

cards.name: Junk Spear
cards.description: Damage enemy Overlord equal to the number of Items you've played
cards.flavor_text: Where have I seen this contraption rising 4 times before?

cards.name: Zed Kit
cards.description: Restore all Def to 2 random ally zombies
cards.flavor_text: Mending broken limbs since 1888

cards.name: Grower
cards.flavor_text: That's the fifth arm he's lost today.

cards.name: EverlaZting
cards.description: Death: Shuffle this card into your deck
cards.flavor_text: "Guess who's back?"

cards.name: Healz
cards.description: Entry: Overlord +3 Def. If Overlord 10 Def or less, Overlord +5 Def
cards.flavor_text: His buddy Jack would be proud

cards.name: Rainz
cards.description: Entry: Restore 10 Def randomly split among allies
cards.flavor_text: Make it R-A-A-I-N-Z!!!

cards.name: Zcavenger
cards.description: If this zombie kills a zombie, draw a random card
cards.flavor_text: A beton nya mombay m'bwa!

cards.name: Spikez
cards.flavor_text: Come closer... it's never too close

cards.name: RelentleZZ
cards.flavor_text: The best survival tactic: "never give up"

cards.name: Polluter
cards.flavor_text: Spreading goo to a faucet near you

cards.name: HoZer
cards.description: Entry: Gets +1 Atk if you have a Water zombie in play
cards.flavor_text: The undefeated spitting world champion, can hit a squirrel from 100ft

cards.name: FroZen
cards.description: Death: Draw a card if there is a Frozen zombie in play
cards.flavor_text: When grabbed - sing: "let it go, let it go.."

cards.name: Slider
cards.flavor_text: Loves skating so so much!

cards.name: Zub-Zero
cards.description: Entry: 3 damage to a zombie, if it survives Freeze it
cards.flavor_text: Hates pointing things out...

cards.name: Zquall
cards.description: Entry: Put 2 Air zombies that cost 2 goo from your Hand to play
cards.flavor_text: Not even close to Texas anymore

cards.name: Groundy
cards.description: Entry: If this is your only zombie in play, it gets Heavy
cards.flavor_text:
"Saturday... again?! 
This cycle is getting on my nerves"

cards.name: Sparky
cards.flavor_text: Hermes has NOTHING on him

cards.name: Rager
cards.description: Entry: If this is your only zombie in play, get Feral
cards.flavor_text: Always dreamed of being Superman...

cards.name: Alpha
cards.description: Entry: All other ally Fire zombies in play get Feral
cards.flavor_text: Let's huddle up and do a howl

cards.name: Volcan
cards.description: Cannot Attack. End: 5 damage to a random enemy
cards.flavor_text: Loves to make it rain... RAIN of FIRE!

cards.name: Torch
cards.description: Destroy a zombie that costs 3 goo or less
cards.flavor_text: Bringing out the pyro-enthusiast in all of us

cards.name: Shovel
cards.description: 3 damage to an enemy OR restore 3 Def to an ally
cards.flavor_text: Friendly neighborhood shovel!

cards.name: Shopping Cart
cards.flavor_text: Silly fun times... until someone loses an eye or a head!

cards.name: Leash
cards.description: Entry: Gain control of an enemy zombie
cards.flavor_text: No more BRAINZZZZZ

cards.name: Bulldozer
cards.flavor_text: When you REALLY want to level (with) someone

cards.name: WiZp
cards.flavor_text: Zeeee... peski littl-- oh its you?!

cards.name: Zplitter
cards.description: Entry: Place another copy of this zombie in play
cards.flavor_text: Out, OUT...GET OUT!!!

cards.name: Zeeder
cards.flavor_text: You reap what you sow

cards.name: Blight
cards.description: Delayed 3: Place 2 4/4 Blight Minions in play then Destroy this
cards.flavor_text: If you plant it they will come... with a bang

cards.name: Zlopper
cards.description: +1 Atk to all ally Toxic zombies
cards.flavor_text: What a dragggg...

cards.name: Boomer
cards.flavor_text: Wants to share his LOVE with everyone - free hugs?!?

cards.name: Zteroid
cards.description: Death: All ally zombies in play get +2 Atk until end of turn
cards.flavor_text: Needs to flee from his fans, as they want his delicious insides

cards.name: Vortex
cards.description: Entry: Replace ally water zombies in play with stronger ones
cards.flavor_text: ERR, never really be satisfied...

cards.name: Zplash
cards.description: Entry: 1 damage to a random enemy for each Water zombie in your Hand
cards.flavor_text: Hey gang, watch how I mow these chumps!

cards.name: Izicle
cards.description: Entry: 2 damage to an enemy if a Water zombie in play
cards.flavor_text: He just looooves his icy skewer

cards.name: Zpring
cards.description: As long as this is in play, you have 1 extra goo
cards.flavor_text: Can never have enough goo... here take a sip

cards.name: Boomstick
cards.description: 2 damage to 3 random zombies in play
cards.flavor_text: Thank you for your service!

cards.name: Blight Minion
cards.flavor_text: If you plant it they will come... with a bang
